QueryTallyResultResponse.title: Query Tally Result Response
QueryTallyResultResponse.description: QueryTallyResultResponse is the response type for the Query/Tally RPC method.

yes.description: yes is the number of yes votes on a proposal.

abstain.description: abstain is the number of abstain votes on a proposal.

no.description: no is the number of no votes on a proposal.

no_with_veto.description: no_with_veto is the number of no with veto votes on a proposal.

cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TallyResult.title: Tally Result
cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TallyResult.description: TallyResult defines a standard tally for a governance proposal.
